82 struct Id {
83 
84  enum Reserved {
85  ModuleBase = 1, //< >= ModuleBase: modules
86  Invalid = 0,
87  Vistle = -1, //< session parameters
88  Broadcast = -2, //< master is broadcasting to all modules/hubs
89  ForBroadcast = -3, //< to master for broadcasting
90  NextHop = -4,
91  UI = -5,
92  LocalManager = -6,
93  LocalHub = -7,
94  MasterHub = -8, //< < MasterHub: slave hubs
95  };
96 
97  static bool isHub(int id) { return id <= Id::LocalHub; }
98  static bool isModule(int id) { return id >= Id::ModuleBase; }
99 };

112  int m_rank;

116 class V_COREEXPORT MessageFactory {
117 
118 public:
119  MessageFactory(int id = Id::Invalid, int rank = -1);
120 
121  int id() const;
122  void setId(int id);
123  int rank() const;
124  void setRank(int rank);
125 
126  template<class M, class... P>
127  M message(P&&... p) const {
128  M m(std::forward<P>(p)...);
129  m.setSenderId(m_id);
130  m.setRank(m_rank);
131  return m;
132  }
133 
134 private:
135  int m_id = Id::Invalid;
136  int m_rank = -1;
137 };

152 class V_COREEXPORT Message {
153  // this is POD
154 
155  public:
156  static const size_t MESSAGE_SIZE = 1024; // fixed message size is imposed by boost::interprocess::message_queue
157 
158  Message(const Type type, const unsigned int size);
159  // Message (or its subclasses) may not require destructors
160 
162  unsigned long typeFlags() const;

229  template<class SomeMessage>
230  SomeMessage &as() { SomeMessage *m = static_cast<SomeMessage *>(this); assert(m->type()==SomeMessage::s_type); return *m; }
231  template<class SomeMessage>
232  SomeMessage const &as() const { const SomeMessage *m = static_cast<const SomeMessage *>(this); assert(m->type()==SomeMessage::s_type); return *m; }
233 
234  private:
236  Type m_type;
238  unsigned int m_size;
240  int m_senderId;
242  int m_rank;
244  int m_destId;
246  int m_destRank;
248  uuid_t m_uuid;
250  uuid_t m_referrer;

266 };
267 // ensure alignment
268 static_assert(sizeof(Message) % sizeof(double)==0, "not padded to ensure double alignment");
269 
270 class V_COREEXPORT Buffer: public Message {
271 
272  public:
273  Buffer(): Message(ANY, Message::MESSAGE_SIZE) {
274  memset(payload.data(), 0, payload.size());
275  }
276  Buffer(const Message &message): Message(message) {
277  memset(payload.data(), 0, payload.size());
278  memcpy(payload.data(), (char *)&message+sizeof(Message), message.size()-sizeof(Message));
279  }
280  const Buffer &operator=(const Buffer &rhs) {
281  *static_cast<Message *>(this) = rhs;
282  memcpy(payload.data(), rhs.payload.data(), payload.size());
283  return *this;
284  }
285 
286  template<class SomeMessage>
287  SomeMessage &as() { SomeMessage *m = static_cast<SomeMessage *>(static_cast<Message *>(this)); assert(m->type()==SomeMessage::s_type); return *m; }
288  template<class SomeMessage>
289  SomeMessage const &as() const { const SomeMessage *m = static_cast<const SomeMessage *>(static_cast<const Message *>(this)); assert(m->type()==SomeMessage::s_type); return *m; }
290 
291  size_t bufferSize() const { return Message::MESSAGE_SIZE; }
292  size_t size() const { return Message::size(); }
293  char *data() { return static_cast<char *>(static_cast<void *>(this)); }
294  const char *data() const { return static_cast<const char *>(static_cast<const void *>(this)); }
295 
296  private:
297  std::array<char, Message::MESSAGE_SIZE - sizeof(Message)> payload;
298 
299 };
300 static_assert(sizeof(Buffer) == Message::MESSAGE_SIZE, "message too large");

305  static const Type s_type = MessageType;
306 protected:
307  MessageBase(): Message(MessageType, sizeof(MessageClass)) {
